wikipedia_page.main: Michael Gordon Skinner (born  (1958-11-26) 26 November 1958), also known as Mickey, Mick, and Mike, is a former English rugby union player who played at flanker for Harlequins, Blackheath and England. His nickname was "Mick the Munch" because of his propensity to inflict bone-shaking tackles on the opposition.  He was born in Newcastle-Upon-Tyne. He attended Walbottle Grammar School.

response: *Michael Skinner (rugby union) (born 1958), former English rugby player
*Michael Skinner (biologist) (born 1956), American molecular biologist and fertility specialist
